name: La Cocinita Mexican Restaurant
address: 112-10 Jamaica Ave, Richmond Hill, NY 11418, USA

reviews.text: Uno de los mejores la mejor comida las mejores bebidas y la atenci√≥n excelente diez de diez.

Excelente servicio,
el molcajete ranchero es delicioso
10 de 10
1st time going here. I like the food. The paint on the walls is really nice plus is family friendly .. Definitely going back soon.

La comida muy rica! Los tacos de birria son los favoritos de mi familia. Y excelente un  servicio.
Gracias Cocinita  Restaurant!

Good food nice place quality food
The cooks deserve a raise
Muy buena experiencia, atenci√≥n satisfactoria.
I absolutely love this place. The foods are amazing, and the inside is just incredible. The people there are so nice and would definitely make your day better. Would recommend.
Excellent Food and atmosphere. Great place to get wonderful food.
Nice place but very pricey.
Un lugar muy agradable   Y un excelente servicio sin contar su hermosa presentaci√≥n en las bebidas y comida  pedimos el molcajete y estuvo delicioso

This is one of my favorite place to visit while in NY. The smell is amazing, the food is delicious, the music makes you want to dance while waiting for your food. Unfortunately I forgot about taking a few pictures for the food to share. As soon as the food hit the table the smell had me almost drooling to I went to town on. I can‚Äôt wait to visit again.

La Cocinita es un lugar donde te tratan como en tu casa. Te dan la bienvenida con una sonrisa y te atienden de inmediato. La comida es excelente. Cuando vayan pregunten por Estefany es la mejor preparando las bebidas ella me prepara una pi√±a colada espectacular. Recomiendo este lugar con los ojos cerrados. No solo el servicio es espectacular tambi√©n es limpio .Visiten la Cocinita no se arrepentir√°n. Yo voy ah√≠ todo el tiempo con mi novio y nos encanta es nuestro lugar favorito.
Great non sophisticated Mexican food
Birria tacos deliciosos con su salsa
We got the cemitas de milanesa de res and the birria tacos along with margaritas. It was delicious and the service was great. We will be back!!

Muy ricos los sopes y las salsa esta en su Punto. Service really good  thank you  a Stefania.  Bueno aun que  esta vez no me gustaron los tacos de lengua 04/19/25 5pm. Aun sigue dandole buen sabor a la comida. Thank you  Stef for the costumer service

‚ÄúDon‚Äôt judge a book by it‚Äôs cover‚Äù
The same could be said about this spot

First of all been here many times but first time doing a review because they deserve it.

Tacos are great specially‚ÄúLengua‚Äù which a lot of places don‚Äôt have it.
Plus I got steak and carnitas.

Quesadillas are good and tortas even better.

Check out this spot for happy hour on drinks!!!

This place may look unassuming on the outside but they make some good food. Both the steak and the birria quesadillas were delicious and they come with sour cream which you don't actually see at too many places without an upcharge nowadays.‚Ä¶
Un lugar bonito y acogedor ü•∞!!la comida rica ,  excelente servicio , fue nuestra primera vez y volveremos a regresar a probar otro platillo.
Fried tilapia for $16 ish. Super worth it. Wow!

La comida es deliciosa, la ate con de las empleadas excelentes muy pero muy amables me encanta eso que sea atendida con respeto y amor y ay se siente como cenando en casa y el lugar es muy limpio alucino en este restaurante
Lugar citado en queens recomendado.

Good food . I've ordered via Uber eats I always wanted to try the food out when I would pass by but never had a chance to. Now I had my free time I wanted to give this place a try overall best spot I've tried so far I've tried other around the area nothing compared to them. Other places I've been to tasted old or they mess up my order
Need more  improve. Not good place very rude.  Customers service Not quality
A little pricey but once I ate the tacos it didn‚Äôt even matter. It was so good!
Es un lugar delicioso para compartir con la familia, amigos o parejas.. lo recomiendo al 100% para esos amantes de la comida mexicana üòãü´∂üèª
Muy rica la comida el pozole con sabor y todo üòãü§§ delicioso
I haven't eaten there, only delivery or pickup
Buen servicio excelente atenci√≥n
Not real mexican food,  similar flavors but not to bad  for tex- mex food,  Fair prices ...  only real Mexicans  know what I mean
Overcharged me extra. Order an Al Pastor Taco - just didn‚Äôt ended up getting it.

Consistently good quality food. Tasty. Nice servers when we go in person. No matter what I order, it is guaranteed to be delicious!

Today we ordered mole enchiladas, caldo de res, and a torta de birria. Dessert was coconut milk jello.

(No photos because it was too tasty.)
Birria tacos were terrible. The consomm√© was watery and had no flavor. The taco shells were hard to bite into and the beef. The only thing good was the sauce. $17 for trash food.

I been living in the neighborhood for a year and i just went to this place, its my third time going and the food its soooo good the people that works really nice and warm, nothing to complain about you should try üòÆ‚Äçüí®ü´°. Love this place the prices are really fair. Tysm LA COCINITA MEXICAN. Make me happy
Very delicious taco.thank you
The atmosphere is pleasant, and the staff is helpful, but the tacos de lengua were dry and lacking in taste. But, the taco al pastor was good.

This place is certainly a hidden gem. I've been here over five times, and still have yet to be disappointed. The fish tacos are ALWAYS on point. The shrimp has never been overcooked, perfectly cooked and has the right consistency. Speaking Spanish would be a plus, but you can certainly get service in English. If you dine in, you get a complimentary chips + salsa!
Este lugar tiene muy buena comida y bebidas. La quesadilla de birria esta muy buena. La presentaci√≥n de la comida y el servicio al cliente son muy buenos.
The grilled chicken tacos are so yummy. The tostada was crispy and full of flavor. I liked the red sauce the most.
Just passed by this place and wanted to order a drink and charge my phone. Ended up getting tamarind juice, onion rings and 2 tacos (steak and shrimp) everything fresh and delicious!!
The food was great! The service was super great and fast! I recommend coming here ! I would definitely come back here again !

Waited an hour and a half for my food then received the entire wrong order. The restaurant refused to correct the issue so a full refund was given by grubhub. The nachos are a complete mess and awful. Someone out there is eating an expensive order for free. Smh. Is this the new scam? Picking up two orders and giving away the big orders to friends or family...so done with grubhub and all other delivery sites...Delivery Scam..not the restaurant!!!!!

Amazing food, was looking for a authentic Mexican place and can definitely say the tacos, nachos, and flautas hit the spot. The owner even threw in a free dessert amazing and will come again. :) BIRRIA QUESADILLAS TO DIE FOR.
Strawberry Margaritas are amazing. The Salsa and chips, birrias and quesadillas are my go to. Tacos are also very good. Can recommend enough
Muyyyy ricoo el guacamole y la horchata üòãüòã bueno todo est√° rico ah√≠ es mi nuevo lugar favorita para comer. Tambi√©n las bebidas ‚ò∫Ô∏èüòãü´∂üèº‚ù§Ô∏èü´∂üèº

The people here are so so nice ! Treated me so well! The place is beautiful and super clean, and the food is top notch! I had a Chorizo Cemitas and it was delicious! They threw in a free Horchata juice. I hope to see them here for a very‚Ä¶
I ordered a cemita Al pastor and it was delicious, the Mezcal Margaritas came in different flavors. Worth the trip!!!
S√∫per rico, los tacos de al pastor,chorizo,asada y pollo s√∫per buenos, y el agua de Jamaica s√∫per primera ves que como de ac√° y me encanto ü§üüèºüòé
Best steak and spicy enchilada tacos ever ! Have ordered a few times and hasn‚Äôt disappointed can‚Äôt wait to try the rest.!

Just ordered the caldo de pollo today, it was my first time trying out this restaurant and I must say it was absolutely delicious. It was the perfect temperature, and flavor. And everything on the side was wrapped perfectly so were the tortillas to stay hot. Will definitely be ordering from here again.

Decent shop, organized and well decorated.

However, the food I‚Äôm not really authentic. The pozole soup had 1/3 oil separation. Platters were not appealing either the meat was dry. Price point was also very high for quality of food.

Tacos are you best bet! Good luck!

Excelente en todos los sentidos.
Excellent food and great attention from the host
Love this place! My husband, son and I try to go every week. üòã ü•ë guacamole with tostones, enchilada verde and steak tacos are awesome! Oh and the margaritas are the best!!! Awesome staff!!!‚Ä¶
